abstract: North American Financial — the Miami-based bank holding company run by the former vice chairman of Bank of America, R. Eugene Taylor — has filed to go public.
snippet: North American Financial — the Miami-based bank holding company run by the former vice chairman of Bank of America, R. Eugene Taylor — has filed to go public.
lead_paragraph: North American Financial, the Miami-based bank holding company run by the former vice chairman of Bank of America, has filed to go public.

headline.main: North American Financial Files for I.P.O.
